message: I'm excited to offer you this great product for a price that I think is very reasonable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $140.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I would like to counteroffer at $125 for the product.
I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob, but I'm afraid I need to make a bit more than that. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $135.
I understand, Alice. Let me counteroffer at $130 for the product.
I'm still a bit above my minimum price, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I'll sell the product to you for $132.50
